mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(MI_SID), '0') AS MI_SID FROM MANAGER_INFO WHERE MI_ID= #{miId} AND MI_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{miPw}, #{miPw})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS EMERGCOUNT FROM SITTING_EMERG_RECEIVE SER LEFT JOIN SITTING_EMERG_COMPLETE SEC ON SER.SER_SID = SEC.SEC_SID WHERE SEC.SEC_SID IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS WALK_EMERGCOUNT FROM WALK_EMERG_RECEIVE WER LEFT JOIN WALK_EMERG_COMPLETE WEC ON WER.WER_SID = WEC.WEC_SID WHERE WEC.WEC_SID IS NULL

SELECT SAC.SAC_SID AS sacSid,SAC.SB_SID AS sbSid,SAC.SAC_DATE AS sacDate,MI.MI_NAME AS miName FROM SITTING_ACC_COMPLETE SAC LEFT JOIN MANAGER_INFO MI ON SAC.MI_SID = MI.MI_SID

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOIN_MEMBER) AS totalCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SITTING_LICENSE) AS sitterCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WALK_LICENSE) AS walkerCount, ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOIN_MEMBER) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SITTING_LICENSE) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WALK_LICENSE)) AS basicCount FROM DUAL
